channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rubio faces ghosts of American interventions after spearheading Maduro takedown
item.description: Marco Rubio is suddenly facing his most daunting puzzle in his 28 years in politics. The U.S. secretary of state didn't just help mastermind the ouste...

item.title: "It looks weak": Some Democrats want their party to shut up and clap for Maduro's capture
item.description: Some Democrats are grumbling at their party's largely oppositional stance to President Trump's raid to capture Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, sa...

item.title: Who is Delcy Rodríguez, Maduro's No. 2 now leading Venezuela?
item.description: Venezuela's future with the U.S. after the stunning capture of Nicolás Maduro largely hinges on Delcy Rodríguez , the vice president turned de-facto l...

item.title: Scoop: Israel-Syria talks planned in Paris with U.S. mediating
item.description: Senior Syrian and Israeli officials will meet on Monday in Paris to resume negotiations on a new security agreement , according to an Israeli official...

item.title: How Trump’s foreign intervention could shake up the midterm elections
item.description: Democrats immediately argued that U.S. military action in Venezuela was an abandonment of the president’s promise to focus on improving lives at home.

item.title: Secret Service plans unprecedented staff surge with anxious eye on 2028
item.description: The Secret Service has launched an effort to expand by about 20 percent to relieve pressure on an overstretched workforce and reduce reliance on outsi...

item.title: Rubio takes on most challenging role yet: Viceroy of Venezuela
item.description: The top U.S. diplomat has pushed for regime change for over a decade. Now the hard part begins.

item.title: What Maduro’s ouster means for Trump’s mass deportation campaign
item.description: Trump said many Venezuelan immigrants “want to go back.” Will Maduro’s removal spark a return — or another exodus?

item.title: Trump administration misled Congress before Maduro raid, Democrats say
item.description: The attack to seize Venezuela’s president came months after Secretary of State Marco Rubio told lawmakers the administration didn’t intend to invade t...

item.title: How the operation to take out Venezuela's Maduro unfolded
item.description: The order came at 10:46pm ET on Friday night, along with a message from President Trump : "Good luck and godspeed." The big picture: Trump's order sen...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino
item.description: President Donald Trump will give a speech in Northeastern Pennsylvania on Tuesday, the first stop in a ‘tour’ where he will talk about affordability c...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
